name: APP_EXIT
description: Tracked whenever App goes to background.

name: USER_LOGOUT
description: Tracked when a user Logs out of the app/site or user reset.

name: PUSH_ID_REGISTER_ANDROID
description: Tracked when the Engage 3.0 system registers the push id for Android devices. Attribute registered_by has the status.Â

name: CLOSED_WEB_PUSH_SOFT-ASK
description: Tracked when a user closes the Push Permission Soft-ask on your website as part of the 2-step Push Opt-in mechanism.

name: DENIED_WEB_PUSH_SUBSCRIPTION
description: Tracked when a user denies receiving push notifications on the Web.

name: OVERLAY_CLICKED_IN_1-CLICK_HTTP_SUBSCRIPTION
description: Tracked when a user clicks a Subscription Message on your website as part of the HTTP Push Subscription flow.

name: OVERLAY_SHOWN_IN_1-CLICK_HTTP_SUBSCRIPTION
description: Tracked when a user views a Subscription Message on your website as part of the HTTP Push Subscription flow.

name: REACHABILITY_PUSH_ANDROID
description: Reachability Push Android is True (200) when the user is reachable on at least one android device.

name: REACHABILITY_PUSH_IOS
description: Reachability Push iOS is True (200) when the user is reachable on at least one iOS device.

name: REACHABILITY_PUSH_WEB
description: Reachability Push Web is True (200) when the user is reachable on at least one web device.

name: UNSUBSCRIBED_FROM_WEB_PUSH
description: Tracked when a user directly unsubscribes from the website/chrome settings or GCM communicates that a push token is invalid.

name: CONNECTOR_SENT
description: Tracked when a connector was sent successfully.

name: EMAIL_SOFT_BOUNCED
description: Tracked when our system finds an email is soft-bounced. Typically happens when there is a temporary delivery issue. This is tracked uniquely for every user based on the user ID.

name: GOOGLE_ADS_AUDIENCE_SYNCED
description: Tracked when the Google Ads API returns a 2xx response for add or delete request to an audience.

name: IN_APP_CLICKED_ANDROID
description: Tracked when a user clicks In-App message on Android device.

name: IN_APP_CLICKED_IOS
description: Tracked when a user clicks In-App message on iOS device.

name: IN_APP_CLICKED_WINDOWS
description: Tracked when a user clicks In-App message on Windows device.

name: IN_APP_CLOSED_ANDROID
description: Tracked when a user dismisses In-App message by clicking on the close button on an Android device.

name: IN_APP_CLOSED_IOS
description: Tracked when a user dismisses In-App message by clicking on the close button on an iOS device.

name: IN_APP_CLOSED_WINDOWS
description: Tracked when a user dismisses In-App message by clicking on the close button on an Windows device.

name: IN_APP_SHOWN_WINDOWS
description: Tracked when an In-App message is shown to the user on a Windows device.

name: IN_APP_SHOWN_ANDROID
description: Tracked when an In-App message is shown to the user on a Android device.

name: IN_APP_SHOWN_IOS
description: Tracked when an In-App message is shown to the user on a iOS device.

name: NOTIFICATION_CLICKED_WEB
description: Tracked when a user clicks notification on the browser.

name: NOTIFICATION_DISMISSED_IOS
description: Tracked when the user dismisses the notification on iOS device.

name: NOTIFICATION_RECEIVED_IOS_APP_ACTIVE
description: Tracked when App in foreground and user receives the notification on iOS.

name: NOTIFICATION_RECEIVED_WEB
description: Tracked when a user receives a notification on a browser.

name: NOTIFICATION_SENT_WINDOWS
description: Tracked when a user receives a notification on a Windows device.

name: NOTIFICATION_SENT_IOS
description: Tracked when a user receives a notification on an iOS device.

name: NOTIFICATION_SWIPED_WINDOWS
description: Tracked when a notification is dismissed by the user with a swipe gesture on Android.

name: WEB_PERSONALIZATION_MESSAGE_CLOSED
description: Tracked when a web personalization campaign is closed by a user.

name: SMS_SENT
description: Tracked when our system sends SMS to a user.

name: WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_DELIVERED
description: Tracked when a WhatsApp Message is delivered to a user.

name: WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_SENT
description: Tracked when a WhatsApp message is sent to a user.
